The video was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been viewed more than 8,300 times.
The video shows a man on a subway train: 3. The simplified Chinese text superimposed on the clip translates to English as: “During Military World Games/American person spread virus/Pay attention to this/The United States is evil”.
